text: @realDonaldTrump You realize the @WhiteHouse is so dysfunctional it's now considered nothing more than a cafeteria for the Smithsonian? Watch out for discarded french fry cartons on the front steps; you're a pig who should pick up his own garbage. #Coronavirus #Masks #TrumpPressBriefing https://t.co/xsZ101ub81
